# baseForegroundColor

**Instance Property**

A color for the paste button’s icon and text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var baseForegroundColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteControl/Configuration-swift.class/displayMode] you choose determines whether this property colors an icon, text, or both.

## Coloring the button

- **baseBackgroundColor**: A color for the paste button’s background.
